import useFetch from "../../hooks/useFetch"; import "./featured.css"; const Featured = () => { const { data, loading, error } = useFetch( "/hotels/countByCity?cities=Dublin,Mumbai,Paris" ); return (
{loading ? ( "Loading please wait" ) : ( <>

Dublin

{data[0]} properties

Mumbai

{data[1]} properties

Paris

{data[2]} properties

)}
); }; export default Featured;
